name: Don't Overthink It (McGameJam Team 20)
description:
Gather up to 3 of your friends and jump into a 2D world to play an online multiplayer game where only one shall survive.

Made in 48 hours for McGill Game Jam 2021

Made with Unity and Mirror. Roughly integrated with Steam using FizzySteamworks for multiplayer functionality.

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/superkaiba/mcgamejam2021
